      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void battle()
      Equivalent to method play in "Game" Checks if both ennemies are alive, if not the battle ends, the evaluation wheter the player wins or looses is done in Game class.

      Allows the player to use an item in battle either a heal or pp(Power Points) restore.

    • Method Detail

      • battle

        public void battle()
        Equivalent to method play in "Game" Checks if both ennemies are alive, if not the battle ends, the evaluation wheter the player wins or looses is done in Game class.

      • useItem

        public void useItem​(Command command,
                    boolean heroFirst)
        Allows the player to use an item in battle either a heal or pp(Power Points) restore. Same implementation as goRoom() in game. Player does not attack if item is used.
        Parameters:
        command - user input processed by the parser
        boolean - checks if hero geos first.
